name: Twining
description: Twining Color Switch comes the Color Switch Lovers New Color Switch World Twining games are made for increasing the focusing level of players. In this game a candy drops from the middle of the circle. The circle has four colors. Players need to tab left and right to switch the circle colors. When the same-colored candy drops the same side of the circle color, then the candy color will change. If somehow the player is losing his/her attention from the game, then there are more possibilities that he/she loses.
